title: Person of Interest ''Point of Origin'' - doMINIc and Circles (4x08)
author: YT.POI
comment: For those who complain about education... see what happens when you hire a competent teacher lol?

I'm not the only person who noticed that!!!!!!!!! "All of the world's infinite possibilities rest within this one simple circle." This was always one of my favourite lines from this show. When Dominic said it...lets just say I had a minor spaz/feels attack. So maybe Finch used to be a math teacher? Or they had the same math teacher? Or Finch and the math teacher read the same book? They're practically quoting each other! It must be connected somehow.
so this going to be M'baku...cool.

"Don't you think about it!"
Jerome: (clearly thinking about it)
Holy crap how did I not notice this. I can't wait until they first meet and realise they've overlapped circles before =D
description: Dominic / Mini - Played by Winston Duke
